alert.note: Alert for Hooker (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:37PM CDT until May 07 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTH CENTRAL HOOKER AND NORTHWESTERN MCPHERSON COUNTIES... At 736 PM CDT/636 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles northwest of Tryon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Sand Beach Lake and East Cody Lake. This includes Highway 92 between mile markers 182 and 183. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
